description: Summer arrives to Bokuto Station. Miyuki and Natsumi have to work on a beach road protecting the safety of the civilians that are enjoying their summer vacations. Suffering because of the heat, the two officers are having problems remaining calm when a pickpocket appears on the beach and causes a ruckus. The girls must do their best to catch the thief, control the traffic, and enjoy their summer day.

titles.title: File 6: Diverting Traffic at the Beach
